scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && bin/rollup-node && rollup -c --banner "$(preamble)"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" build/d3-request.js -c -m -o build/d3-request.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-request/build/d3-request.js d3-request.v1.js && cp ../d3-request/build/d3-request.min.js d3-request.v1.min.js && git add d3-request.v1.js d3-request.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-request ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-request.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-request.js build/d3-request.min.js
